level.heading: Disqualification from presumption as to disability or death.
Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-311 added this section.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 656 of D.C. Law 15-194, as added by D.C. Law 19-311, § 2, provided that this subchapter shall apply upon the inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan, as certified by the Chief Financial Officer to the Budget Director of the Council in a certification published by the Council in the District of Columbia Register.
